item.description: So long and thanks for all the fish. You can find where to follow me at jmj.omg.lol.
So, this is how my time on Twitter comes to an end. With the apps that made it what it was getting killed off with no explanation or warning.

item.title: About
item.description: üëãüèª Hi, I’m Joanna! I grew up in South Carolina and currently live in San Jose, California where I work as a Software Engineer. I primarily build iOS apps, but in general I love creating (and occasionally finishing) everything. When I’m not building things I enjoy: üìö Learning new things üë±‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Listening to Taylor Swift üèà Watching Clemson football üì∑ Taking photos üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà Fighting for equality If you’d like to chat you can find me on Mastodon or Instagram.

item.title: cycle.log
item.description: The easiest way to track your menstrual cycle. cycle.log automatically calculates your cycle length and reminds you of your upcoming period. üîí Privacy Policy Your privacy is very important to us. We do not sell or share any of your data and we never will. None of your personal data is collected and your period information is only stored on your device so you can feel safe using cycle.log. If you have any questions please contact us at privacy@jmjordan.
